title: BSEQ
description: The BSEQ benchmark schema definition, describing the BSEQ benchmark configuration.

benchmark_name.description: Name of the benchmark. Must be 'BSEQ' for this schema.

shots.description: Number of measurement shots (repetitions) to use for the benchmark.

max_colors.description: If specified, the maximum number of colors to use in the BSEQ benchmark. If unspecified, all colors will be used.
